message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_NO_SERVICES
message.locale: This contract cannot be generated as no services have been added.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_NO_GROUPASSOCIATE
message.locale: This contract cannot be generated as no providers have been added.

message.name: ERR_FV_GENERATED_NO_GENERATIONREASON
message.locale: The Generation Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTIVATE_NO_DATESIGNED
message.locale: The Date signed must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_STARTDATES
message.locale: The contract Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the following provider - provider group association Start Dates, %2s covered by this contract.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_ENDDATES
message.locale: The contract End Date, %1d, must be on or before the following provider - provider group association End Dates, %2s covered by this contract.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_GROUP_PROVIDERS_REMOVED
message.locale: This contract cannot be generated as the following provider(s) named in the contract, %1s, have been removed from the provider group.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_GROUP_PROVOFFERINGS_STARTDATES
message.locale: The following provider offering Start Dates, %1s are after the Start Date of the contract, %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_GROUP_PROVOFFERINGS_ENDDATES
message.locale: The following provider offering End Dates, %1s are before the End Date of the contract, %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_GENERATED_GROUP_PROVOFFERINGS_REMOVED
message.locale: This contract cannot be generated as the following service offerings for the following providers,%1s named in the contract have been removed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_PROVOFFERINGS_DELETED_CONTRACT_CANNOT_BE_GENERATED
message.locale: This contract cannot be generated as the following provider services,%1s named in the contract have been deleted.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_PROVOFFERING_DELETED_CONTRACT_CANNOT_BE_GENERATED
message.locale: The provider service,%1s named in the contract has been deleted. The contract cannot be generated.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATES_ON_CONTRACT
message.locale: At least one Provider must be associated with the contract.

message.name: INF_NO_PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATES_WERE_ADDED_TO_CONTRACT
message.locale: No Providers were added to the contract '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_DATE_SIGNED_MUST_BE_AFTER_GENERATION_DATE
message.locale: Date Signed, '%1d', must on be on or after the generation date, '%2d'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_START_DATE_AFTER_CONTRACT_START_DATE
message.locale: The contract Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the following provider - provider group association Start Dates, %2s, covered by this contract.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_END_DATE_BEFOR_CONTRACT_END_DATE
message.locale: The contract End Date, %1d, must be on or before the following provider - provider group association End Dates, %2s, covered by this contract.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_REMOVED_FROM_GROUP
message.locale: This contract cannot be activated as the following provider(s) named in the contract, %1s, have been removed from the provider group since the contract was generated, %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: All provider group associates named in the contract must be approved before the contract can be activated. - The following provider group associate(s) are not approved, the contract cannot be activated: %1s

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: The provider must be approved before a contract can be activated.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_LICENSE_TYPE
message.locale: There is no approved license of Type %1c for this provider.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_LICENSE_TYPE_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: There is no approved license of Type %1c for the following providers, %2s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_LICENSE_TYPE_FOR_PERIOD
message.locale: The license period, %1d to %2d, does not cover the contract period, %3d to %4d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NOT_GENERATED_CANNOT_PREVIEW
message.locale: The contact has not been generated, it cannot be previewed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NOT_GENERATED_CANNOT_PRINT
message.locale: The contract has not been generated, it cannot be printed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_DELETED_CANNOT_PRINT
message.locale: The contract has been deleted, it cannot be printed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_DELETED_CANNOT_PREVIEW
message.locale: The contract has been deleted, it cannot be previewed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACTRENEW_CONTRACT_NOTLIVE
message.locale: The contract is not 'Live', it cannot be renewed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACTRENEW_CONTRACT_DELTED
message.locale: The contract has already been deleted, it cannot be renewed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACTRENEW_CONTRACT_TERMINATED
message.locale: The contract is 'Terminated', it cannot be renewed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACTRENEW_CONTRACT_AMENDED
message.locale: The contract is 'Amended', it cannot be renewed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_NOTCOVERED_BY_LICENSE
message.locale: The provider does not have approved licenses of Type %1c covering the entire contract period, %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_NOTCOVERED_BY_LICENSE_GROUP
message.locale: The following providers, %1s do not have approved licenses of Type %2c covering the entire contract period, %3d to %4d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CONTRACT_RENEWED_STARTDATE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Start Date of a contract created by renewing a previous contract cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_LONG
message.locale: Name must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_STARTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: Start Date must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_STARTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_CONTRACTSTART
message.locale: Start Date, %1d, must be on or after original start date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_OVERLAPPING_RATES_ON_SERVICES
message.locale: The following Contract Service(s) have overlapping rates: %1s.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_RATE_NOT_COVERING_ENTIRE_CONTRACT_PERIOD
message.locale: The Contract Service(s) %1s, do not have rate(s) for the entire period %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_OVERLAPPING_PLACELIMITS_ON_SERVICES
message.locale: The following Contract Service(s) have overlapping place limits: %1s.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_PLACELIMITS_NOT_COVERING_ENTIRE_CONTRACT_PERIOD
message.locale: The Contract Service(s) %1s, do not have place limit(s) for the entire period %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_TERMINATION_REASON_SELECTED
message.locale: Termination Reason must be entered.

message.name: PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: - provider group associate end date

message.name: PROVIDER_GROUP_ASSOCIATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: - provider group associate start date

message.name: ERR_STARTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_EITHER_OF_CONTRACTSTART_AND_TODAY
message.locale: Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the start date of the original version of the contract, %2d, or today's date, %3d, whichever is earlier."
